amendment.description: Amendment to prevent funds from being used to implement the Bureau of Land Management's "Waste Prevention, Production Subject to Royalties,and Resource Conservation" rule.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 63 printed in House Report 115-297 to prevent funds from being used to implement the Bureau of Land Management's "Waste Prevention, Production Subject to Royalties,and Resource Conservation" rule.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pearce amendment (A089) Agreed to by recorded vote: 216 - 186 (Roll no. 484).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pearce amendment (A089) Agreed to by recorded vote: 216 - 186 (Roll no. 484).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A089) offered by Mr. Pearce.
